title: Street Worker and Sex Workers, Bombay, India
marks: Signature, Title, Date and Inscription on back, in pencil: [Street Worker and Sex Workers
description: boy carrying a large sack at center, talking to a seated girl, seen from back at left; four girls stand in doorways at left; woman seated in doorway at right; cot-like object in foreground, with figure or bundle
creditline: Gift of Jack and Kay Dunne
